hero.title: Custom Packaging
hero.description: From graphic design to final production, we offer complete offset printing solutions for your packaging, boxes, bags, cups and more.

about.title: Pakado Style, more than just a
about.description: We are not just a packaging supplier. Pakado Style is an offset printing company that supports you from A to Z: graphic design, personalized advice and professional printing. Our mission? Transform your ideas into packaging that reflects your identity and appeals to your customers.

products.title: A complete range of
products.description: At Pakado Style, we offer and manufacture packaging that enhances your products and brand. Thanks to offset printing, we guarantee exceptional image quality and premium finishes.

sandwich_box.name: Sandwich box
sandwich_box.description: Ideal for practical packaging with optimal customization according to your needs. Customizable dimensions.

pizza_box.name: Pizza box
pizza_box.description: Perfect for your pizzas with high quality custom printing.

burger_box.name: Burger box
burger_box.description: Eco-friendly and customizable packaging for your burgers.

sushi_box.name: Sushi box
sushi_box.description: Transparent boxes for your sushi with customization possible.

salad_box.name: Salad box
salad_box.description: Perfect containers for your fresh salads with airtight lid.

pasta_box.name: Pasta box
pasta_box.description: Hot packaging for your pasta dishes with excellent thermal retention.

plastic_container.name: Plastic tray
plastic_container.description: Resistant trays for all types of food.

soup_bowl.name: Soup bowl
soup_bowl.description: Perfect bowls for soups and broths.

custom_cup.name: Custom cup
custom_cup.description: Cups with your logo and design.

plastic_bag.name: Plastic bag
plastic_bag.description: Plastic bags with high quality printing.

whyChooseUs.title: Why choose
whyChooseUs.description: Your success starts with good packaging

faq.title: Frequently
faq.description: Quickly find answers to the most asked questions by our customers about our custom packaging, delivery times, materials and customization options.

designService.question: Do you offer a design service for packaging?
designService.answer: Yes, our team of expert designers can create a unique design that reflects your brand's visual identity. You can also bring us your own files and we take care of the printing.

customPackaging.question: How to order custom packaging?
customPackaging.answer: Contact us via our form or by phone. We will discuss your needs, provide you with a detailed quote and take care of the entire production process.

packagingTypes.question: What types of packaging do you offer?
packagingTypes.answer: We offer a wide range: food boxes, trays, custom cups, kraft and plastic bags, as well as all customizable tableware accessories.

ecoFriendly.question: Is custom packaging eco-friendly?
ecoFriendly.answer: Yes, we favor recyclable and eco-responsible materials. Our cardboard and kraft packaging is biodegradable and environmentally friendly.

deliveryDetails.question: What are the manufacturing and delivery times?
deliveryDetails.answer: Times vary depending on complexity and quantity. Generally, allow 7 to 15 business days after validation of the design and purchase order.

showcase.title: Packaging that catches the eye, a print that
showcase.description: At Pakado Style, we believe that packaging is much more than just a container: it's a real communication medium. Each box tells a story that connects us and captures our brand. Discover our achievements with printed quality that makes all the difference.
